snippet: “Devotion,” an exhibition at New York University’s 80WSE, shows a surprising range in the work by Bob Mizer, known for his erotic photographs of men.
abstract: Ken Johnson reviews photography exhibition Devotion: Excavating Bob Mizer at New York University's 80WSE gallery.
lead_paragraph: “Devotion,” an exhibition at New York University’s 80WSE, shows a surprising range in the work by Bob Mizer, known for his erotic photographs of men.

headline.print_headline: Beyond Beefcake In the Work Of a Gay Pioneer
headline.main: Beyond Beefcake in the Work of a Gay Pioneer
